desc: Run separate VM process or attach to a running VM
Set temporary memory size in MB
Set temporary video memory size in MB
Use fixed SDL video mode with given width height and bit/pixel
Disable mouse/keyboard grabbing on mouse click w/o additions
Get hostkey identifier and modifier state
